He hard counters her because if she ever gets within 650 range of the minion wave he WEQ's her and with electrocute that's 60% of her health gone.

He hardcounters her because he can use any of his shadows to juke her bubble.

And he hardcounters her because by lv6 his ult allows him to WEQ, port on top of her after she's slowed by shadow E, and ult when she tries to sleepy trouble bubble him. No mage can peel a well working Zed's burst.

It's why Ahri will ban a Zed but not a Talon because her ult lets her easily kite Talon and most mages outrange Talon's Q and will only get hit by first part of rake (so he can't combo them), but in the case of Zed he has a retarded range of 650, a way faster burst combo with the shadow, and he can ult, do an E>auto>ignite and shadow out and gets a guaranteed kill without having to stay in melee range.

Zed has way too much damage for the range he has and the amount of escapes he has compared to other assassins.

Then there's also the fact AD assassins get the luxury of longsword+ 3 pots and resolve whereas mages will only have 2 pots ever and resolve hurts Zoe far more than it hurts Zed since Zed's poke is so frequently available (6 sec cd shuriken is ridiculous).
